https://tmrev.io/movie/143579-Benjamin Smoke 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Benjamin Smoke is the highly acclaimed documentary by directors Jem Cohen and Peter Sillen on legendary underground musician Benjamin Smoke. Benjamin Smoke follows the crooked path of this fringe-dweller, speed-freak, occasional drag-queen and all-around renegade living in the hidden Atlanta neighborhood called “Cabbagetown,” and playing with his band Smoke. Benjamin Smoke
